Name: Bad Guy: Neighborhood
About the game: Bad Guy: Neighborhood is a unique open world free roam style game. Complete objectives, mini games, and fight bosses to earn money and unlock unique items and abilities in the store. Encounter special enemies and find hidden secrets as you explore a violent and unpredictable neighborhood. Features 15+ unique weapons and abilities Unique Arrest/'Police' system Special date-able characters 5 boss fights to beat Objective and task progression system Time rated mini-games Borderline psychopathic game-play options Unknown secrets that unlock super secret things (very secret) Continuous open-world, do whatever you want Chaotic NPCs constantly fighting/killing each other Customizable NPC amount (more/less chaos)
